title: Fps stuck at 60
body:
I don't know why my fps is stuck at 60 all the time altough i have vsync disabled. 
The fps stops at 60 in all settings low or very high. 
Plz help

replies.body:
I'm glad someone else has this problem. Over a match I would average about 200fps and now I am also stuck at 60 no matter what I do. 
It's a pain in the butt.

I played last week and my frames stayed around 120-150 all game.  After the update to 6.18 my frames are capping at 60, but nothing on my computer or league display settings have changed.  Any help would be great.
So its from the patch. Interesting. I taught it was my pc cuz i just changed my hdd and switched to windows 10.
I'm not 100% sure if it was the patch, but it is the only thing that has changed on my computer since it happened.

Help is here!  FPS issues are usually a result of outdated drivers, but there could be other reasons too.  Go over each step in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune things up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
it doesnt work for me can i get some help pls?

If going through each step of the guide wasn't able to fix this up, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out.  I also suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach a set of logs to your ticket for context.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
